Whether Past or Future She Could Not Say.--I have been urged by the Spirit of the Lord to fully warn our people in regard to the undue familiarity of married men with women, and women with men. This lovesick sentimentalism existed in the [city] mission at _____ before you were connected with it. I was shown you with others manifesting the same; whether this was in the 
                                                                           55
past or the future I cannot say, for often things are presented to me long before the circumstances take place.--Letter 17, 1891.
